Rui P. Fernandes, MD, DMD, FACS, FRCS

Professor

AFFILIATION

  • Associate Chair, Department of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery
  • Chief, Division of Head and Neck Surgery
  • Program Director, Head and Neck Oncologic Surgery and Microvascular Fellowship
  • University of Florida College of Medicine–Jacksonville
  • Jacksonville, FL, USA

BOOKS

  1. Bell RB, Fernandes RP, Andersen PE. Oral, head and neck oncology and reconstructive surgery. 1st ed. St. Louis, MO: Elsevier; 2017.
  2. Fernandes RP. Local and regional flaps in head and neck reconstruction: a practical approach. 1st ed. 2014.

The Journal is Supported by

  1. Ettinger KS, Ganry L, Fernandes RP. Oral cavity cancer. Oral Maxillofac Surg Clin North Am 2019;31(1):13–29. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.coms.2018.08.002
  2. Mendenhall WM, Dagan R, Bryant CM, Fernandes RP. Radiation oncology for head and neck cancer: current standards and future changes. Oral Maxillofac Surg Clin North Am 2019; 31(1):31–8. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.coms.2018.08.003
